The description that it is one size is very misleading. It is 100% Acrylic so it doesn't have a nice feel to it, and it certainly isn't one size - it is a Small or Medium at best. The neck is tight and the design looks more elegant and flows  more in the image than it does in real life. I regret ordering this product. I won't be returning it, but I don't recommend it.

I purchased this about a year ago, and I loved it! Nice color, nice fabric and fit. Then I gave it away thinking that I would just hit the reorder button to get a new one. I found the item in my orders and hit “buy it again”. Then it came something in a totally different fabric AND style. I thought it was one mistake and returned it. I reordered the first one again. It came again in totally different fabric . I return it again new, never used, but they are taking an unusual long time to refund my money.I hope I will NOT have one more problem with this poor quality product. I would give a 5 stars to the first purchase, but after 2 more bad quality items came and I still wasn’t able to replace the original one, I have to give a zero or minus.

评论概述: Man this thing is so small- and y’all 4 stars know it
评论详情: I’m so surprised at how many positive reviews this thing has gotten especially the ones with PICTURES, where you can literally SEE that it’s ridiculously small and short- y’all WANT it to fit and look cute, because the material is sooooo crazy soft and the design itself could be amazing if it was sized properly and also stitched together correctly. I know because I also love love the material and plan on disassembling it and sewing a little lap blanket from it, it’s so warm!  But I’m not going to delude myself or anyone else into thinking this is anything but a ZERO star product, merely because I’m trying to soothe the burn of buying a poncho for petite juniors or “husky” girls size that barely reaches my knees and the hood is  JUST big enough to fit on my head lolI’m not plus size or super tall or anything, I’m just regular size like 7-8 am im 5’6”  so a LARGE should fit perfectly. I’m posting in the “what is this, a  _____ for ants?????” Subreddit because it belongs there.
